metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9055 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue, also known as DW201703-001, was discovered in libdwarf2017-03-21. In dwarf_formsdata() a few data types were not checked forbeing in bounds, leading to a heap-based buffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9055` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20180129-1
libdwarf1 - 20180129-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180129-1').
